external_games.name: Yamamura Misa Suspense: Kyoto Ryuu no Tera Satsujin Jiken
Yamamura Misa Suspense: Kyouto Ryuu no Tera Satsujin Jiken

name: Yamamura Misa Suspense: Kyoto Ryuu no Tera Satsujin Jiken
summary: American investigator Catherine Turner has just been accused of a crime committed on the grounds of Kyoto's most famous temple and must prove her innocence by examining crime scenes, collecting evidence and talking to suspects. The first in a series of murder mystery games by Taito written by and named for Japanese mystery writer Misa Yamamura.
